title: Eves passive mark
body: I've noticed that eves ! when shes in range isn't showing up until shes right next to you

replies.body: wen ev hits her e for that speed as she gets to the point were she is just out of range the game dose not realise at first witch is why this happens its a bug happens some times not other times but its not a big deal she don't do that much damage if your jg takes her champs early
